record.dc:title: 56HS6 Link Site 19HS6, Humphreys County, Tennessee. Group of stone graves after removal of surrounding earth. Burials 24 and 25 in foreground. Direction south.
record.wpa:narrative: [19HS25] Small size of grave indicates child burial. [19HS26] No Narrative. [19HS27] Broken pottery bowl at NE end of grave is the only indication of orientation of head. Small size of grave indicates child burial. [19HS28] Small size of grave indicates burial of infant. [19HS30] The above objects (pottery vessel, clay trowel, 1 quartz and 3 stone objects) cached 1' from E end of grave. Suggesting E orientation of head. [19HS31] Mound number 19. [19HS32] Mound number 19. Number of individuals one (?).
